paper.title: Grammars on partial graphs

author.org: Institut für Math. Maschinen und Datenverarbeitung (II) der Univ. Erlangen-Nürnberg, Erlangen, Federal Republic of Germany D-8520#TAB#
Forschungsgruppe Automatentheorie und Formale Sprachen der TU Berlin, Berlin 10 D-1000#TAB#

paper.abstract: The concept of Chomsky-grammars is generalized to graph-grammars; the "gluing" of graphs is defined by a pushout-construction. In the present paper, we allow the left-hand and right-hand side of a production to be partial graphs, i.e. graphs in which there may be edges without a source or target node. A necessary and sufficient condition for applicability of productions is given. Furthermore, convex graph-grammars are studied.
